name: Super Avocado Counter
description:
Hello, do you like avocados? I think yes, so you NEED to play this game now!

If you gonna play this game on your mobile, you need to download the APK file.

This game was made for The Fresh Game Jam. The theme was "GREEN" and I like avocados, so if they are green I can make an avocado game for this jam.

Enjoy it!

Success Sound: Here

Fail Sound: Here

Music from Youtube Audio Library.
